definition.name: NXmatch_filter

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: n_values
symbol.doc: How many different match values does the filter specify.

definition.doc: Settings of a filter to select or remove entries based on their value.

field.name: method
field.doc:
Meaning of the filter: Whitelist specifies which entries with said value to include. Entries with all other values will be filtered out.
Blacklist specifies which entries with said value to exclude. Entries with all other values will be included.

field.name: match
field.doc: Array of values to filter according to method. For example if the filter specifies [1, 5, 6] and method is whitelist, only entries with values matching 1, 5 or 6 will be processed. All other entries will be filtered out.
